info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 3 at 6:09PM EDT until July 3 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Melbourne FL
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following county, Orange.
* WHEN...Until 815 PM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 609 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Orlando, Orlando International Airport, Conway, Oak Ridge, Belle Isle, Pine Castle, Lake Nona, Hunters Creek, Lake Hart, Doctor Phillips, Edgewood, Taft, Southchase, Meadow Woods, Sky Lake, Holden Heights, Williamsburg and Tangelo Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM EDT THIS EVENING
